  ingredient_name STRING,
  quantity FLOAT,

)

UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = CASE WHEN quantity > 5 THEN quantity - 5 ELSE quantity END

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recipes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (
    recipe_id INT,
    ingredient_id INT,
    quantity_used INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE()

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recipes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (
    recipe_id INT,
    ingredient_id INT,
    quantity_used INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE ingredients SET name = 'Organic Ingredients' WHERE id IN (SELECT ingredient_id FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 1)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recipes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (
    recipe_id INT,
    ingredient_id INT,
    quantity_used INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE recipe_ingredients SET quantity_used = quantity_used + 1 WHERE recipe_id = 2 AND ingredient_id = 3

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE ingredients ( ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), quantity_in_stock DECIMAL(10,2) )

CREATE TABLE recipes ( recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255), serving_size INT )

CREATE TABLE ingredient_usage ( usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_id INT, ingredient_id INT, quantity_used DECIMAL(10,2), FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id) )

CREATE TABLE alerts ( alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_id INT, message VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id) )

### STATEMENT

UPDATE ingredients SET quantity_in_stock = 20.50 WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
